name: Kidnap the plant
description:
Kidnap the plant is a short shooter game that focuses on a robot who lands on a strange planet that is filled with lots of plants. Curious by this the Robot kidnaps three of them and takes them to thier base not knowing that many plants have followed the robot back which will lead to a war between the plants and robot...

CONTROLS:

left mouse button: shoot

spacebar: jump

W,A,S and D to move.
